original_text: I will send them away as prisoners. They will live among foreign nations that they had never heard about. Their ancestors had not heard about them either. I will send enemies to chase after them until I have destroyed them.’
korean_text: 그들과 그들의 조상이 알지 못하던 여러 나라 가운데에 그들을 흩어 버리고 진멸되기까지 그 뒤로 칼을 보내리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: They will live among foreign nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이방 나라들 가운데 살 것이다

sentences.original_text: that they had never heard about
Their ancestors had not heard about them either
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 조상들도 그것에 대해 들어본 적이 없었다

sentences.original_text: I will send enemies to chase after them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 쫓아가도록 원수들을 보낼 것이다
